alert.note: Alert for Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 4:25PM EDT until September 07 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Schoharie County in east central New York... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 425 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jefferson, or 16 miles southwest of Cobleskill, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Jefferson around 430 PM EDT. Summit around 440 PM EDT. Richmondville around 445 PM EDT. Cobleskill around 455 PM EDT. Schoharie and Central Bridge around 500 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Leesville, Zeh Corners, Beekman Corners, West Richmondville, Baird Corners, Seward, Old Central Bridge, Lawyersville, Warnerville and Sharon. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
